title: how small juice vendor reach 200/day to 200 cr/day
selftext:
A Juice Stall guy from a small city in india Lavishly married (200 Crore) in Dubai booking 7-Star hotel, booked private jet Nagpur-Dubai, paid 110 cr to wedding planner, made A-List bollywood celeb perform( list attached as image) 

https://preview.redd.it/mu7q9fapy5ub1.png?width=1052&format=png&auto=webp&s=22d8f9bb3aa0489d48709c75e2a9eee3aedf2572

So whats happenning. Lets take a deep dive, shall we

It starts from Bhillai a small city in chattisgarh, Sourabh Chandrakar used to work as a small juice vendor in local market and has a friend named Ravi Uppal who had a small tire shop and every evening after work they used to do gambling at one point they got so addicted they begin to even bet with relatives money soon they lost near to 10-15 lakhs rupees each and fled to dubai with few savings amount. At dubai they worked as waiter in restaurant, driver, guard etc after few years with the money they saved they hire someone to make an app called Mahadev Book why Mahadev coz they stall name was Mahadev and also God they knew it will impact Indian the right way and oh boy it created such impact. In the beginning 2019 they started to promote this app via Instagram meme pages and influencer but very few traction but in 2020 when lockdown came people were desperate to earn more and they grew exponentially after lockdown LAKHS of people daily used this app where essential you can bet on cricket, poker or any game you think of, betting app. They did something very smart in the beginning if you win money is yours and even if you don’t they used to give return some money to user. This caught like wildfire and user started recommending to friends and family. After sometime the app started behaving as a gambling app always used to be now chances of wining was reduced and almost everyone begin loosing money. They had 41 call centers in India,Nepal,Bangladesh, call center why? Coz they used to very patiently and sweetly explain and entice people to bet more and more and were receiving a % commission for this and rest was transferred to Sourav and ravi via Havala.On top of that a lot of dubai big businessmen and Pakistan businessmen gave funding to them so it almost became an unstoppable machine. Fastrack to 2023 sourav did his marriage ceremony spending whooping 200 CRORES where even these A-list celebs were performing and this caught eye balls and traction like a spaceship and even from whom they might never wanted, Enter ED india and raided 39 locations and seized 417 Crore worth of assets and many A-list Bollywood stars are under investigation and soon a red notice may be isssed against Sourav and ravi and like dominos it all began to fall one by one and then none.
comments: Neighbour uncle's story's the same. He started off selling lotteries ig and now is into cricket betting. He is frequent traveller to dubai and man, his kids are splurging like crazy since 4-5 years lol.
